features: 🥰Eye Protection & CRI>90: The LED desk lamp offers a natural and soft light close to the sunlight, CRI>90. No flicker, no glare, less blue light hazard. It helps to relieve eye fatigue caused by long-time watching computer screens, thus safeguarding our eyes. This is very suitable for large workbenches, drafting desks, and architect desks, allowing you to have a good lighting environment when working, reading, studying, drawing, crafting, or making up for Halloween, Christmas, and Birthdays.

💛3 Color Modes & Stepless Dimming: Our black desk light for dorm offers 3 distinct color modes: warm light(3000K), warm white light(4000K), and cool light(6000K), and 9 brightness levels, which you can adjust effortlessly with switches control for optimal illumination. A perfect solution for those who want to pick the best light to control the look and feel of your space, lets it be ideal for any indoor activities.

👍Saving Space & 360° Rotation: Strong metal clamp supports the thickness of the desktop edge up to 2", saving valuable space on your desk. Please insert the metal clamp completely into the tabletop, tighten it, and keep the desktop and bottom flat. The 360° long adjustable flexible gooseneck allows you to adjust your dimmable clamp light with ease and to direct the light wherever you want.

💡USB Power Supply & Energy Saving: Our office desk lamps come with a dedicated 5V/2A adapter, which is more safe and more reliable than other adapters. No need for an extra adapter purchase. Incorporating the aluminum alloy structure, the light board has superior heat dissipation performance, is more energy-efficient, and extends the lamp's service life.

🗒Please Notes: The installation of the clamp lamp is simple and tool-free. However, please remove the lamphead's protective film before use. It is crucial to use a 5V/2A adapter designed for desk lamps to ensure optimal performance. Using an incompatible adapter may result in insufficient brightness, flickering, or potential damage. If you encounter any issues within the first 12 months, please contact us for immediate assistance and a satisfactory resolution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent bang for buck, AWESOME Fish Tank Light!
reviews.reviewText: I recently just purchased a second one. I have it mounted as a bed lamp. The first, I purchased to light my fish tank. My apartment doesn't have the best lighting, where I had to set up my tank. Which made it so that my fish were not seeing all of the food, and then it was going to waste. These lamps are REALLY GREAT. They are a really good, really well working design. The controls are very simple, and easy to figure out. I love it that the power switch is backlit when not turned on. That helps TREMENDOUSLY when trying to find the power switch. I really like that it has dimming capability, to make the light brighter, or less bright. This is great, because I can turn it down, and not worry about hurting my own, or my fish's eyesight. You can also change it between white, or a yellowish light. Which is very nice, if somebody is sensitive to a white light. The adjustable neck on these are quite long. With the head bent over, it will clear 25 inches of height. This lets me put the lamp quite a bit above my tank. It also means that it would clear the top of a larger tank, as well. There is also a screw in the base, that will let you lower the neck down, and then secure it lower, if the neck is too long for what you need. The base is sturdy. I kind of wish that there was a rubber or felt pad on the clamp, and on the underside of the base. It would help to protect the furniture, and give the base more grip on the surface of what it's clamped to. While the vice action of the lamp is metal, the base is plastic. So just keep that in mind too. The base does hold quite securely. The one in my room is attached to a 1/2 inch ledge. Which does NOT appear to be secure at all. But, I tested, and it's not easy for me to knock it loose. The neck is thick, solid, and (please forgive me) quite robust. When you get it where you want it, it stays there. Doesn't droop (as long as your base is secured well) and is easy to re-angle or bring around to another place, if you want/need to. The one that I have over my bed works really well. I have it so that I don't have it glaring off of my laptop screen, with a medium light, in yellow mode. I'm really quite pleased with that. But... I'm not a light sensitive sleeper. I've fallen asleep with it on, twice now. (Oh my light bill!!! LOL) This is a great design, quality is much better for what you expect at it's price. And it's pricepoint makes it an overall GREAT value. Bang for the buck. Serious bang for the buck. I highly recommend this product, and yes... I will be buying again! I like that they went with a USB type B connector and wall plug design. It makes it quite versatile. Particularly for those of us that prefer USB ports which don't block other holes in the surge protector. I plan on getting a third one for a work bench light, as soon as I start getting tools and a workbench.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and bright! Comes with USB adapter
reviews.reviewText: Wow, this light is nice and bright on the highest setting, and it looks just like the pictures. It comes with a usb adapter. The neck part is long, sturdy and flexible so you can bend it down low or high. When set the neck straight to test out how bright it was I was amazed that it almost lit up the whole room, the room is about 200sq feet. I am going to get another one. It is only 10 watts so it is a great way to save money while working and keep your home cool in the summer. It also has settings where you can change the light to a warm color and also dim the light down, after a while I dimmed the light lower during the evenings. I am really happy with this light, it is such good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this light to do press on nails/desk work and it does the job great, the light is super bright and I can bend it however I need to if I'm doing some very detailed work. It does overheat after a while of use but that's to be expected since it's a plug in light, overall great product and highly recommend for beginner nail techs or just as a casual overhead lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: I bought this expecting a cheap garbage light. I was surprised to get an all metal unit with nice quality flex arm. The flex arm is tight and holds the light in any position. It works very well and is very bright and can be adjusted dim like a night light. A+ I will see how long it lasts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and bright
reviews.reviewText: Bought the unit because I like the long neck as I have to clamp it on the back of the table and reach over the monitor. It works and the control is simple. Not sure how long it will last but I like it so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install on edge of desk. Plenty bright for me. You will likely need an extension cord, as the cord on it isn't too long. Great desk light on a budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, so far
reviews.reviewText: I needed a lamp for my dark computer/craft corner. This light is pretty amazing and bright. I don't even need my room light on (it is also great that it has the three tones of colors, especially for using in the dark). I have not attached it to my, table, which I am a little wary of because it may not fit, BUT I have attached it to my bed and have been crocheting with it. Love that I can bend it so that it only lights my craft and I don't have to shine it over my head and it is also thin enough that it doesn't obstruct my view. I will try to come back to update if it fits my table or not xD

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's not as bright as I hoped.
reviews.reviewText: The light itself is usableIt's not as bright as I had hoped. My eyesight isn't what it used to be. Not bad but I need a bright light to solder by. Like I said. It's okay.
